text: "You Win Again" is a song from 1987. It was written by Barry, Robin and Maurice Gibb. It was performed by the Bee Gees. The band released it as a single in late 1987 and from their album E.S.P.. It marked the start of the band being popular again. It was a No. 1 hit in a lot of European countries, and it topped the UK Singles Chart. That made it the bandâ€™s first song to top that chart in over eight years. It also made them the first band to score a UK No. 1 hit in the 1960s, 1970s, and 1980s. ==References== Category:1987 songs Category:Bee Gees songs Category:Pop rock songs Category:Arena rock songs
title: You Win Again (Bee Gees song)
